data.title: Go Here: Open Houses to Check Out March 26
data.meta_description: Wondering what you should do this weekend? Why not get a first look at these beautiful homes!
data.text:
Wondering what you should do this weekend? Why not get a first look at these beautiful homes!

Saturday

6817 Deloache Ave., Dallas. Bright and fresh, complete remodel with thoughtful and functional renovation designed by an architect. Many areas were taken down to the studs to create an open kitchen and den living space. Luxury appliances, quartz counters, two sinks. Canned and pendant lights complete the spacious island kitchen. Charming enclosed porch for exercise or second study. Entertainers will love the open spaces, wine bar, view to back patio, and pool. Gated driveway and detached garage. The charming open courtyard adds an area for play. Four bedroom/ three baths. $1.6 million. Schools: Preston Hollow Elementary, Benjamin Franklin Middle School, Hillcrest High, Our Redeemer, Christ the King Elementary, Heritage School of Texas, Wesley Prep, St. Marks. Open house: 3:30 p.m. to 5:30 p.m.

5166 Artemesia Lane, Dallas. David Weekly Home in Oak Park with great vibes and a convenient location. This home is bursting with beautiful finishes and impeccable style. Both sophisticated and comfortable, this home features hardwood flooring, an open floor plan and a kitchen fit for dinner parties. Enjoy tall ceilings, great flow from the kitchen, dining room, and living room. Situated on a private interior lot, the home features a fenced in front yard and balcony off second floor. Community features a swimming pool, covered pavilion, and dog parks. Three bedrooms/three-and-a-half baths. $689,000. Schools: Maple Lawn Elementary, Thomas J. Rusk Middle School, North Dallas High, K.B. Polk Center for the Academically Talented and Gifted, Longfellow Middle School, Providence Christian School. Open house: 1 p.m. to 3 p.m. Saturday and Sunday.

Sunday

3759 Juniper Dr., Dallas. This stunning one-story modern was built by award-winning builder Avant Homes in 2019. Flooded with natural light, this property features floor-to-ceiling windows and soaring ceilings. SMART home offers CAT 5e, speaker wire, low volt for windows, and sliding doors for auto shades. Design highlights include solid white oak floors, exotic natural stone counters, Bertazonni gas range, and a self-cleaning convection oven. Incredible primary suite with gorgeous views of the pool and a designer bathroom complete with vessel tub, oversized rainfall shower a master closet. Located in sought-after Midway Hollow. Three bedrooms/ three-and-a-half baths. $1.3 million. Schools: Harry C. Withers Elementary, Prestonwood Montessori at E.D. Walker, E.D. Walker Middle School, W.T. White High School, Good Shepherd Episcopal School, Grace Academy, Hockaday, St. Rita, Lamplighter, Jesuit. Open house: 3:30 p.m. to 5 p.m.

8427 Midway Road, Dallas. Located in the desirable neighborhood of Bluffview, minutes from shopping, dining, and Downtown Dallas, this charming home sits on a generous lot with a park-like setting. The living and dining room opens to the spacious kitchen, all enhanced with wood floors and walls of windows drawing in natural light. The kitchen is appointed with a gas range, granite counters, stainless appliances, and a large pantry with a laundry area. The second level primary suite includes a spacious bath with tub, shower, dual vanities, and sitting area. French doors lead from living areas to the outdoor deck and an additional covered sitting area. Three bedrooms/two baths. $885,000. Schools: Maple Lawn Elementary, Francisco Medrano Middle School, Thomas Jefferson High, Wesley Prep, K.B. Polk Center for the Academically Talented and Gifted, Longfellow Middle School, Providence Christian School. Open house: 2 p.m. to 4 p.m.
